meanings.sent1: In the story, the hero's archenemy was the evil sorcerer.
meanings.sent2: The superhero battled his archenemy in a fierce showdown.
meanings.sent3: The archenemy of the brave knight turned out to be a mischievous dragon.
meanings.sent4: The rivalry between the two pirates was so intense, they considered each other archenemies.
meanings.sent5: The archenemy's sinister laugh echoed through the dark castle.

meanings.sent1: The team's archenemy in the championship game played very aggressively.
meanings.sent2: The politician's archenemy criticized every decision he made.
meanings.sent3: The archenemy of the detective turned out to be his own twin brother!
meanings.sent4: The chess player considered the queen as his archenemy on the board.
meanings.sent5: Facing his archenemy in the final round, the boxer gave it his all.
